scripts.build: set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 && set CI=false && set DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true && react-scripts build
scripts.build:prod: set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 --optimize-for-size && react-scripts build
scripts.build:minimal: set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && set CI=false && react-scripts build
scripts.build:light: set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 && set CI=false && set DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true && react-scripts build
